homepage_meta_title: Online Portal for Virtual Events Conferences and Summits | Openexpo.com
homepage_meta_description: Create an online event or a summit in 5 easy steps. Connect visitors and stand owners/booth owners around the world.
footer_text: Imagine your online event with an unlimited number of active participants, stands and booths from anywhere in the world without any restraints by space or number!
email_confirmed_message: Welcome to Openexpo. You can close this tab or proceed to sign in with credentials you specified earlier.
email_error_message: Something went wrong, please try again later
email_expired_tooltip: Please press "Forgot password" on a sign in form to get new code, as previous is already expired
disabled_collection_type: Sorry you have no items for this collection type
search_no_result_message: There is no result for your request
vm_unavaliable_message: Stream has not started yet, wait a bit
vm_unavaliable_presenter_message: Stream has not started yet, click "Start stream" button to start your stream
vm_survey_asked_qa_ph: Done! You can send another one in 5m...
vm_chat_unavailable: Chat is unavailable without active translation
other_features_title: In addition check out Openexpo’s other features!
advancedsponsorship_text: Bring sponsors and attendees closer together. Let visitors have an interactive experience while roaming around the platform.
streamingintegrations_text: Apart from our In-House Video solution we are happy to offer integrations like Vimeo and Youtube.
unlimited_booths_stands_title: Unlimited number of booths/stands on the event
inhouse_video_text: Broadcast video to the attendees for the workshop, expo or conference with moderation and other features.
customisations_event_text: Event's identiy is very important. We give the ability to create the unique feel to the event.
what_are_you_waiting_for: What are you waiting for? First event is free of charge!
event_what_type of_event_you_planning_ti: Do you know what type of event you are planning to host?
in_house_video_big_div_title: Check out how our In-House video looks like
in_house_video_big_div_text: Our In-House broadcasting allows the presenters to host an awesome video translation.
check_other_solutions_title: Also check out Openexpo’s other solutions!
virtual_festival_platform_text: Hosting a virtual festival has never been easier. Openexpo let's one set up the festival in a few easy steps
online_exhibition_host_text: Host a full blown event with loads of stands/booths, sponsors, and many many more functions
host_virtual_conf_text: Sometimes an event organiser needs to setup a simple conference but with some ehnancements that are not offered by others
already_decided_title: Already decided on the event you want to host?
learn_more_about_custom_fields: Learn more about custom fields feature
make_you_event_personal_text: Molding the event to the event organiser's view in a few clicks is one of our core beliefs. We always target simplifaction and customisation that meets quality.
make_you_event_personal_tab2: Add your logos to the top of the page!
make_you_event_personal_tab3: Interact with viewers not just in chat!
customise_your_event_with_colours_title: Customise your event with different colours
customise_your_event_with_colours_text: Colour schemes are great to match the corporate identity of the event
change_logo_for_event_text: Each event usually has a unique logo (branding), we allow to add the custom logo to the event.
add_another_language_text: Display the event for the international attendees in their language
invite_sponsors_to_event_text1: One of the advantages that Openexpo brings into the picture is our Sponsor Feature. With this feature apart from attracting attendees and exhibitors, an event organiser can bring sponsors onto the event
invite_sponsors_to_event_text2: The feature allows the sponsors to interact with attendees in multiple different ways, this way promoting their brand and making attendee's life more interesting during the event
find_anything_on_event_title: Find anything that interests you on the event!
find_anything_on_event_text: Searching on the web is the second nature, so we made it possible to find anything on the event!
people_search_text: Find and instantly chat with or arrange meeting with notable people that attend an event or stand.
stand_search_text: Easily access to stands and brands that may interest you. Find out who is present on each stand!
tag_search_text: Just looking for something specific that interests you on a certain event? Tag seach is your best friend!
everything_in_one_place_text: One of our big goals is to make the platform interactive as possible. At the same time we make sure that our platform stays simple to use and gives the best experience to attendee and exhibitors as possible!
everything_in_one_place_tab1: Roam around the event and meet new people!
everything_in_one_place_tab2: Watch the broadcast in the background!
everything_in_one_place_tab3: Host live broadcasts on a selected topic
engage_with_sponsors_title: Engage with sponsors with roulettes, questionaires, pop-up videos
engage_with_sponsors_text1: Above we have mentioned that our platform allows to engage sponsors, but the biggest question is how, if you are still reading this and you have not clicked on the "learn more about sponsors" button, here is a brief summary
engage_with_sponsors_tab2: Add surveys and questionaires to your event!
engage_with_sponsors_tab3: Engage your visitors with interesting pop-up videos!
add_custom_fields_title: Add custom fields for people to register on your event!
add_custom_fields_text: At times, event organiser would want to collect as much data is possible before the attendee registers. We give this opportunity by providing pre-defined and custom fields being added for the registration.
add_custom_fields_tab2: See the list of participants and their custom fields!
add_custom_fields_tab3: Understand your visitors with custom fields!
fill_your_event_with_title: Fill your event with meaningful content!
we_started_creating_text1: When we have started creating our platform, we asked ourselves a question: What would we want to see on a virtual webinar? What would be of value to us whilst surfing the event?
we_started_creating_text2: We realised that apart from just having a webinar, it has to be a bit of CMS platform, we would want to advertise our webinar in advance of the event, therefore we would need all functionality in 1 place.
we_started_creating_tab1: Easily create nice-looking articles for the event!
we_started_creating_tab2: Add downloadables of any extension for visitors.
we_started_creating_tab3: Add contents in different languages simultaneously!
setup_your_event_broadcast_title: Set up your agenda and use In-house broadcast tools!
setup_your_event_broadcast_text: What kind of of a webinar without the Video broadcasting functionality? It is obvious that we as a platform to provide the live broadcasting!
setup_your_event_broadcast_tab3: Get all the stats you need to know if your event was a success!
virtual_workshop_platform_text: If you want to host a workshop that has a number of advanced features, we are here to help you with this.
rd_modal_success_modal_message: Your request has been successfully sent
rd_modal_valid_phon_inv: Phone number must contain only numbers and "()-# "
notpermitted_text: It seems you don’t have access here right now. Please check that you are:
notpermitted_point2: 2. Have permissions to view this page
notpermitted_point3: 3. The event passed moderation (you can check with the event organizer)
notpermitted_footer: If you are sure you should see this page, please contact page owner (e.g. event organiser).
staff_title: Stand representatives who will be at the event
staff_text_1string: You can make an appointment with them to discuss issues about the event or related to professional matters
staff_text_2string: Select who you want to have an appointment with
staff_meeting_type_text: Select how you want the meeting to take place
staff_duration_text: Select how long you think the appointment will last
staff_additional_info_text: Write a summary or any detail that your contact should know before the event
staff_date_time_text: The available days and hours are shown below.
staff_congrats_text: Your meeting has been scheduled successfully!

direct_link_visit: Transparent login link as a visitor

invalid_youtube_link: Link to youtube video is invalid

errors_notification_text:
Dear user.
We found some issues that may prevent the page from working normally. System administrators are already notified, so no need to panic. If you need assistance, please contact us via email, feedback form or by chat icon on the screen.
